item.name: Athena
item.desc: Upgrade to increse the chance of all elements' base damage and gold.

item.name: Poseidon
item.desc: Poseidon has the chance to appear,eliminate it and the same row elements disappear.

item.name: Gaea
item.desc: Gaia has the chance to appear, eliminate it and 9 squares around disappear simultaneously.

item.name: Apollo
item.desc: Apollo has the chance to appear,eliminate it and the same column elements disappear simultaneously.

item.name: Hephaestus
item.desc: Hephaestus has the chance to appear, eliminate it and elements in the same column and row disappear simultaneously.

item.name: Zeus
item.desc: Zeus has the chance to appear, eliminate it,then the full- screen same color elements disappear simultaneously and enhance A 2-fold increased ATK.

item.name: Hades
item.desc: Hades has the chance to appear,eliminate it and the full- screen elements disappear simultaneously.
